actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to provide for United States Government guarantees for certain obligations of the Farm Credit System.
short_title: Farm Credit Bond Guarantee Act of 1985

summary.text: Farm Credit Bond Guarantee Act of 1985 - Amends the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to provide Government guarantees for Farm Credit System obligations issued before December 31, 1988, and outstanding as of such date.

titles.title: Farm Credit Bond Guarantee Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to provide for United States Government guarantees for certain obligations of the Farm Credit System.
